name: Super Heavy Sword
description:
Get Ready to Get HEAVY!

Monster Robot Studios presents SUPER Heavy Sword!
The sequel to the smash hit HEAVY sword which has been downloaded over 1/2 million times!
Take control of Pike or Princess Lucinda and set out to rescue the King's 5 kids!
explore a massive world with loads to discover!

Watch the trailer
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YzmCJKPlRao

SUPER Heavy Sword features:

*64 levels with 64 medallions to collect!
*30 lost paintings to find
*18 bugs to collect
*5 Ginat Boss Battles
*Tons of items and power ups to collect
Throwing daggers
Bow and Arrows
Bombs
Boomerangs
Throwing axes
Magic swords
*Awesome moves to learn
Summersault
Wall kick
Long Jump
Ground Pound
* in game achievements as well as Game Center Achievements and leader boards!

What are you waiting for?! the kingdom needs your help!

Check out Monster Robots other games
HEAVY sword
Steam Punks
Bridge the Gap II
Down With The Ship
Galaxy Cat
